text: The Ljubljana–Hague Convention on Mutual Legal AssistanceFull name: The Ljubljana – The Hague Convention on International Cooperation in the Investigation and Prosecution of Genocide, Crimes against Humanity, War Crimes and other International Crimes is an agreement to make the prosecution of those who break the international criminal law faster. * * * ==Parties== It was agreed to by 68 countries on May 26, 2023.
